items.title: Businesses, unions and civil society leaders welcome Royal Assent of Employment Rights Act
items.summary: Leaders from across the business community, trade union movement and wider civil society have welcomed the Employment Rights Act receiving Royal Assent.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notices: anti-dumping duty on aluminium foil from China
items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for Business and Trade relating to the anti-dumping duty on aluminium foil from China.

items.title: Guidance: UK-Republic of Korea upgraded Free Trade Agreement: technical note
items.summary: This technical note sets out the Department for Business and Trade’s (DBT) headline results of the economic impact of the upgraded UK-Republic of Korea (RoK) Free Trade Agreement (FTA).

items.title: Policy paper: Interministerial Group for Trade communiqué: 2 June 2025
items.summary: A note of the meeting held by the Interministerial Group for Trade.

items.title: Notice: Notice to exporters 2025/34: update to general trade licence Russia sanctions – fertilisers
items.summary: The Export Control Joint Unit (ECJU) has updated the general trade licence Russia sanctions – financial services and funds related to fertilisers.

items.title: Guidance: Justification of Practices Involving Ionising Radiation application register
items.summary: Applications and decisions made under Regulations 9, 10 and 12 of the Justification of Practices involving Ionising Radiation Regulations (JoPIIRR) 2004.

items.title: Transparency data: AI Energy Council meetings minutes
items.summary: Minutes of the meetings for the AI Energy Council.

items.title: Domestic energy price indices
items.summary: Quarterly and monthly consumer price indices of fuel components in current and real terms.

items.title: Monthly and annual prices of road fuels and petroleum products
items.summary: Monthly and annual prices of road fuels and fuels used for home heating, plus an index of crude oil prices.

items.summary: Quarterly and annual estimates of the total number of switches by electricity and gas customers.

items.summary: Quarterly and annual prices of fuels purchased by manufacturing industry, in original units and p/kWh, split into consumption sizebands.

items.title: Prices of fuels purchased by major power producers
items.summary: Quarterly and annual prices of fuels purchased by power generators.

items.title: Industrial energy price indices
items.summary: Quarterly and annual price indices for industrial fuels, in real and current terms, including and excluding the Climate Change Levy (CCL).

items.title: Gas and electricity prices in the non-domestic sector
items.summary: Quarterly and annual gas and electricity prices for the non-domestic sector, including and excluding the Climate Change Levy (CCL), split into consumption size bands.

items.title: Comparisons of international road fuel prices
items.summary: Comparisons of road fuel prices against other EU countries, using data from the European Commission Oil Bulletin.

items.summary: Lower Super Output Area (LSOA), Middle Super Output Area (MSOA) and Intermediate Geography Zone (IGZ) gas data.

items.summary: Postcode level electricity statistics for 2019, covering all domestic meters, and split by standard and economy 7 meters.

items.title: New laws bring the world of work into the 21st century
items.summary: Over 15 million people across the UK are expected to benefit as the Employment Rights Act receives Royal Assent.

items.title: Operating an orbital space object: rules and regulations
items.summary: Regulations you must comply with when operating an orbital space object. For example, a satellite.

items.title: Unlocking business: reform driven by you
items.summary: This questionnaire asks businesses large and small to tell government about regulation which is not fit for purpose and unjustifiably inhibits growth, innovation and investment.

items.summary: Regulations you must comply with when operating a spaceport.

items.summary: How to apply for compensation for the indirect costs of the UK Emissions Trading Scheme (UK ETS) and the Carbon Price Support (CPS) mechanism.

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment factsheets: latest update
items.summary: The most up to date snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment positions with trading partners overseas.

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment factsheets (partner names beginning with C to F)
items.summary: A snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment positions with individual trading and investment partners overseas, for partners whose name begins with C, D, E or F.

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment factsheets (partner names beginning with W to Z)
items.summary: A snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment positions with individual trading and investment partners overseas, for partners whose name begins with W, X, Y or Z.

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment factsheets (partner names beginning with G to I)
items.summary: A snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment positions with individual trading and investment partners overseas, for partners whose name begins with G, H or I.

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment factsheets (partner names beginning with P to R)
items.summary: A snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment positions with individual trading and investment partners overseas, for partners whose name begins with P, Q or R.

items.title: Official Statistics: Trade and investment factsheets (partner names beginning with M to O)
items.summary: A snapshot of the UK’s trade and investment positions with individual trading and investment partners overseas, for partners whose name begins with M, N or O.
